summary:
Gives Mehrune\'s Razor a little boost in look and feel.

It makes the center of the blade have more of an Ebony look since it\'s apparently made of Ebony (look at the Temper). It also changes it from a 1% Instant Kill possibility to a 20%. It changes the Instant Kill name to Daedric Banishing as in previous Elder Scrolls games.
descriptionHtml:
Gives Mehrune\'s Razor a little boost in look and feel.

It makes the center of the blade have more of an Ebony look since it\'s apparently made of Ebony (look at the Temper). It also changes it from a 1% Instant Kill possibility to a 20%. It changes the Instant Kill name to Daedric Banishing as in previous Elder Scrolls games.

You have the choice of New Texture or the Original Vanilla one. You can then pick a 5%, 10%, 15%, 20%, 50% and 100% Daedric Banishing possibility percentage.
author: r3van or PsYk0SLaV3

files.name: Mehrunes Razor -Improved-
files.changelogHtml: Added a choice of texture and Daedric Banishing percentage.
